title: #774: Learnings from 1,000+ Near-Death Experiences — Dr. Bruce Greyson, University of Virginia
description: Dr. Greyson’s research for the past half century has focused on the aftereffects and implications of near-death experiences and has resulted in more than 100 presentations to national and international scientific conferences, more than 150 publications in academic medical and psychological journals, 50 book chapters, and numerous research grants.
